name: Project Gambit
description:
A prototype of our forthcoming  tactical fighting game, Gambit. Currently 2 players only.

Each turn, players  choose an action (and/or a direction) and lock them in. Once both players have locked in their actions, everyone's turn resolves simultaneously.

The first (left) player is controlled by the keyboard. Their controls are:

arrow keys => pick a direction

z => attack

x => defend

space =>lock turn in

The second (right) player uses a controller (we've only tested with usb xbox controllers). Their controls are:

Left stick => direction

X => attack

Y => defend

A => lock turn in
